channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [WFLY-5309] jsf/richfaces problem on wildfly
item.description:
attached application with
<jsf.version>2.2.2</jsf.version>
<org.richfaces.version>4.3.7.Final</org.richfaces.version>
works fine on wildfly 8.0, on above versions there is a stacktracee,
now I have tested on 9.0.1 with following result:

14:29:38,973 INFO [org.jboss.as] (Controller Boot Thread) WFLYSRV0025: WildFly Full 9.0.1.Final (WildFly Core 1.0.1.Final) started in 48493ms - Started 888 of 1068 services (221 services are lazy, passive or on-demand)
14:29:43,690 ERROR [io.undertow.request] (default task-1) UT005023: Exception handling request to /webshop/acme.xhtml: java.lang.IllegalStateException

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
You should use RichFaces 4.5.8.Final. Please put it in your pom.xml

<dependency>
<groupId>org.richfaces</groupId>
<artifactId>richfaces</artifactId>
<version>4.5.8.Final</version>
</dependency>
... and build again.

Which version of richfaces-components-ui should I use together with richfaces-core v 4.5.8.Final?
When using [richfaces-components-ui-4.3.7.Final.jar I get error as below:

12:10:06,030 SEVERE [javax.enterprise.resource.webcontainer.jsf.config] (MSC service thread 1-1) Critical error during deployment: : java.lang.IllegalAccessError: tried to access method com.google.common.collect.MapMaker.makeComputingMap(Lcom/google/common/base/Function;)Ljava/util/concurrent/ConcurrentMap; from class org.richfaces.javascript.ClientScriptServiceImpl
at org.richfaces.javascript.ClientScriptServiceImpl.<init>(ClientScriptServiceImpl.java:57) [richfaces-components-ui-4.3.7.Final.jar:4.5.9.Final]
at org.richfaces.application.ValidatorModule.createClientScriptService(ValidatorModule.java:66) [richfaces-components-ui-4.3.7.Final.jar:4.5.9.Final]
at org.richfaces.application.ValidatorModule.configure(ValidatorModule.java:60) [richfaces-components-ui-4.3.7.Final.jar:4.5.9.Final]
at org.richfaces.application.ServicesFactoryImpl.init(ServicesFactoryImpl.java:60) [richfaces-core-4.5.9.Final.jar:4.5.9.Final]
at org.richfaces.application.InitializationListener.createFactory(InitializationListener.java:110) [richfaces-core-4.5.9.Final.jar:4.5.9.Final]
at org.richfaces.application.InitializationListener.onStart(InitializationListener.java:69) [richfaces-core-4.5.9.Final.jar:4.5.9.Final]
at org.richfaces.application.InitializationListener.processEvent(InitializationListener.java:167) [richfaces-core-4.5.9.Final.jar:4.5.9.Final]
at javax.faces.event.SystemEvent.processListener(SystemEvent.java:108) [jboss-jsf-api_2.2_spec-2.2.5.jar:2.2.5]
at com.sun.faces.application.ApplicationImpl.processListeners(ApplicationImpl.java:2187) [jsf-impl-2.2.5-jbossorg-3.jar:]
at com.sun.faces.application.ApplicationImpl.invokeListenersFor(ApplicationImpl.java:2163) [jsf-impl-2.2.5-jbossorg-3.jar:]
at com.sun.faces.application.ApplicationImpl.publishEvent(ApplicationImpl.java:303) [jsf-impl-2.2.5-jbossorg-3.jar:]
at org.jboss.as.jsf.injection.weld.ForwardingApplication.publishEvent(ForwardingApplication.java:294) [wildfly-jsf-injection-8.0.0.Final.jar:8.0.0.Final]
at com.sun.faces.config.ConfigManager.publishPostConfigEvent(ConfigManager.java:691) [jsf-impl-2.2.5-jbossorg-3.jar:]
at com.sun.faces.config.ConfigureListener.contextInitialized(ConfigureListener.java:253) [jsf-impl-2.2.5-jbossorg-3.jar:]
at io.undertow.servlet.core.ApplicationListeners.contextInitialized(ApplicationListeners.java:173) [undertow-servlet-1.0.0.Final.jar:1.0.0.Final]
at io.undertow.servlet.core.DeploymentManagerImpl.deploy(DeploymentManagerImpl.java:187) [undertow-servlet-1.0.0.Final.jar:1.0.0.Final]
at org.wildfly.extension.undertow.deployment.UndertowDeploymentService.startContext(UndertowDeploymentService.java:86)
at org.wildfly.extension.undertow.deployment.UndertowDeploymentService.start(UndertowDeploymentService.java:71)
at org.jboss.msc.service.ServiceControllerImpl$StartTask.startService(ServiceControllerImpl.java:1948)
at org.jboss.msc.service.ServiceControllerImpl$StartTask.run(ServiceControllerImpl.java:1881)
at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1145) [rt.jar:1.7.0_79]
at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:615) [rt.jar:1.7.0_79]
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) [rt.jar:1.7.0_79]

I think, you should use richfaces-core and richfaces, because richfaces already contains the richfaces-ui components, please try and let me know the results.
According to https://github.com/richfaces/richfaces/blob/master/README.adoc#getting-started :
Prior releases of RichFaces required using a BOM to manage the project dependencies. With RichFaces 4.5 all required dependencies are managed transitively, simplifying your project setup.

Thx, it helped.
Now I use only
<org.richfaces.version>4.5.9.Final</org.richfaces.version>
<dependency>
<groupId>org.richfaces</groupId>
<artifactId>richfaces</artifactId>
<version>$

{org.richfaces.version}

</version>
</dependency>
and nothing else, richfaces-core in included in richfaces

[INFO] +- com.sun.faces:jsf-api:jar:2.2.2:provided
[INFO] +- com.sun.faces:jsf-impl:jar:2.2.2:provided
[INFO] +- org.richfaces:richfaces:jar:4.5.9.Final:compile
[INFO] | +- org.richfaces:richfaces-core:jar:4.5.9.Final:compile
[INFO] | | +- net.sourceforge.cssparser:cssparser:jar:0.9.16:compile
[INFO] | | | - org.w3c.css:sac:jar:1.3:compile
[INFO] | | - com.google.guava:guava:jar:18.0:compile
[INFO] | - org.richfaces:richfaces-a4j:jar:4.5.9.Final:compile

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue:
unrar attached wildfly-test.rar
cd wildfly-test
mvn clean install
cp target/webshop.war /opt/wildfly-9.0.1.Final/standalone/deployments
go to http://host:8080/webshop/acme.xhtml
